name: Scary Island - The Survival of Experiment Z plus
name_original: Scary Island - The Survival of Experiment Z plus
description:
A Scary island is an island with no people, where nobody lives & an undiscovered island.

Island sand is red, rumored to have absorbed much blood from past conquests. The lifeless trees rustle with dry breezes. Yet be ever careful, for even the water that lap at the dying tide is black. The evil of this island is ancient. Too ancient. Even for time to conquer...

On island The Zombie is depicted as being unnaturally tall, with very long limbs that he can adjust the length of.

Zombie has the need to kidnap children, and his limbs are said to hypnotize them, making them unable to stop themselves from walking into them.

When they are captured, it is unknown what happens, although it is suggested Zombie takes them to an alternate universe.

Sometimes a piece of cloth is left behind when children are taken. Zombie blends in with trees, and usually hides in plain sight. The more you know about him, the closer it gets.

It stood like an omen. Dark vibes radiating from the very shore. Trees swaying as if to warn off any who come near. Ash it was the ash of thousands of dead bodies scattered from the past.

Typically, a Scary island is denoted as such because it exists in a state of being abandoned.

Download it today and see what the buzz is about!
